ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] bards in AoE groups
ygData.msgSnippet: from what I ve heard (not experienced yet) you probably won t even be pulling, the wizards will with dd spells... you will be the mana provider and straggler
ygData.messageBody:
from what I've heard (not experienced yet) you probably won't even be
pulling, the wizards will with dd spells...

you will be the mana provider and straggler chaser more than likely...

it's supposed to be just incredible XP for higher levels, have a cleric
friend who is doing it and getting enough to make it worthwhile for him at
52...

Raub


At 01:52 PM 01/07/2002 +0000, you wrote:
>have any of you guys ever been into AoE groups? i bet you have ;)
>
>well i have been invited many times but never had the opportunity to join
>one, though they say bards are needed. now i am not sure how aoe groups
>exactly work and what a bards role in such a group is, so any advice is
>welcome.
>
>i only know the bard should pull a lot of mobs, which get chainstunned by 2
>chanters and then smoked by 3 AoE nukers. but do i sing anything else? any
>special hint?
>
>so long
>tobi
>
>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
>with the subject submissions.
>

><http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/>Yahoo! Terms of Service.
